descriptions:
['DescriptionExclusive Links Real Estate Brokers are proud to offer this priced to sell Studio with Community Views in the desirable & brand new Studio One Tower Dubai.
This carefully planned Studio features full lengthwindows and highly efficient layout. Modern interiors, maximizing space & anefficient kitchen.
	360 SQFT
	Open Plan
	Partial Marina Views
	Hand over29 th Oct
Drawing inspiration from other waterfront developments in the world most high-profile cities, Dubai Marina has gone a step further to truly create a city within a city – the new heartbeat of Dubai.
The 11-km promenade is the highpoint of the marina lifestyle and features fine dining restaurants, coffee shops, retail outlets, supermarket and a wide selection of recognised Hotel chains.
This 50 million square foot development house luxury residential and leisure facilities covering over 200 acres of land covering 10 districts.
Contributing to this luxurious living is a shopping mall, day care Centre and fitness clubs, waterside promenade, parks and boat berthing facilities.
Dubai Marina is unlike any other place in Dubai, the Middle East and boasts to be the largest man-made marina development in the World.
Everything you desire is right here and a home in Dubai Marina promises a lifestyle that is enjoyed by those who set uncompromising standards.
Our Team are in Our Shop in Dubai Marina, Marina Gate Tower Dubai Marina Walk please do come in if you have any any real estate requirements.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionOne of the most in-demand types of villa on the Palm, this 3 storey Med Atrium Entry has been painstakingly upgraded to create a wonderful family home that comes complete with Crestron home automation, Lutron lighting and a Sonos sound system with Bowers & Wilkins speakers.The ground floor entrance hall has been transformed into an open-plan reception/TV room that merges effortlessly into the recently refurbished kitchen, fully equipped with Miele and Siemens appliances, and the main living & dining areas.The 1st floor consists of 4 spacious bedrooms with modern en-suite bathrooms and the 2nd floor features a luxurious cinema room complete with\xa0 a state-of-the-art movie projector, a private office and a large outdoor terrace area with awe inspiring views.The 7,712 sq. ft outdoor area has been professionally landscaped to create a sophisticated, yet family-friendly space that includes a temperature controlled pool & Jacuzzi, fire pit, fire bowls, built-in BBQ area, and extra storage.']
